title: Windows, Mac or ISO 8859 character set?
content:
So far, I used Windows character set, but after while, I started to think that I maybe made mistake using this character set for making fonts.

Can anyone tell me whose set should I use: Windows or Mac or ISO 8859? Does this mean that, for example, if fonts were made using Windows character sets that thay may have a certain problems on Mac? Or using Mac's set on Windows?

I didn't mentioned Adobe's sets, since I personaly think that OS are more relevant then "lower" applications in system. Correct me please if I'm wrong.

Thanks.
author: nettoo

comments.content: In OpenType fonts you can include the sum of all three sets to be on the safe side :)
